charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to
head to the forest to do some training.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1101_0200_2:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] walked the familiar path, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] felt a strange
presence unlike anything [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’d" F="she’d" ] encountered
there before.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1101_0600_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] glanced around, searching for the Pokémon’s
Trainer, but it appeared to be alone.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_0301_0700_2: No choice but to battle it!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_0401_0800_2:
Strangely, Pikachu’s attack seemed to have no
effect on it whatsoever!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_0402_1000_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] tried to retreat slowly,
but something strange held [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] in place!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1101_1100_2:
The mysterious Pokémon’s gaze was fixed on
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_1300_1:
*pant pant*
Gosh, so sorry if my partner Pokémon scared you!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_1400_1: It just up and ran off all of a sudden!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_1500_1:
Maybe it realized you were here and wanted to
come say hello?
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_1600_1:
Or maybe this forest reminded it of the Slumbering
Weald, and it ran off in a rush of nostalgia...
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_0401_1800_1:
It’s a forest in the Galar region. It’s where I
first encountered Zacian!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_0402_2000_1:
Yeah! The Slumbering Weald is actually where I
first encountered Zacian.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2100_1:
When I saw it there in the fog that first time,
it had this sort of poised, dignified air about it...
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2200_1:
From that moment on, I dreamed of being able to
go on adventures with Zacian one day.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2300_1:
But as I traveled around the Galar region and
learned more and more about Zacian...
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2400_1:
I realized that what I really wanted was to battle
alongside it! My new dream grew stronger and
stronger with each day.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2500_1:
It pushed me to work hard and become a Trainer
worthy of being Zacian’s partner.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2600_1:
I feel as if maybe that’s the reason it appeared
before me again.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2700_1:
What do you think, Zacian? Did I prove myself
worthy in the end?
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_2900_1:
Maybe you really were the reason Zacian ran off
a minute ago.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3000_1: That’s how it all started with me, too.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3100_1:
Maybe Zacian just likes to appear before Trainers
it takes an interest in.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3200_1:
Hmm. Well, if it’s already this curious about you,
I guess there’s really only one thing left to do.
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3700_1:
Zacian and I have formed quite the bond together
since we paired up in Galar. Now it’s time to
show off what we can do!
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3800_1:
Here’s a little taste of the Pasio-exclusive move
we’ve been working on together...
charaepi_ch0243_00_yuri/2301_1201_3900_1: We call it the Glorious Behemoth Blade!
